column1:
Later  she  struggled  herself  free  and  went  to 
the  deceased's  shop

seeking his help. The witness 
then realised  the back door of the deceased's

shop was 
left open and when peeped  through, seen his  naked body lying
on the ground. She then alerted her other neighbours and  thereafter made
a  complaint  to  Police  about  the  death  of  the  deceased  and  also  of  the

robbery. 
She 
subsequently  made 
another 
statement 
to 
the 
Police
implicating  the  appellant and  the  2nd  accused  and  explained  her  reason.
